#summary 道者易之本，易者道之现

= 心得 =

时移世易，万物皆易。道者易之本，易者道之现。一切变化都有规律，一切规律都有变化。

Dao is the root of change, change is the embodiment of dao.

= grok =
Time goes and world changes, everything changes always. Dao is the root of change, change is the embodiment of dao. All of changes follow the rules, and all of the rules have their changes.
